name: Small Screen Smackdown
description:
Small Screen Smashdown is a mobile 1v1 mobalike. Two players put their skills against each other in fantasy world and try to destroy the opposing team's castle. 

The game has a three playable characters or factions which include a sorceress, an angel and a skeleton priest and each faction has their own unique creep to fight off in an epic battle. The game is played in landscape mode using on-screen joystick and buttons. 

The game was made by a team of 8 game developers from Finland.

Tatu Puukko
Matti Vikberg
Anastasija Sapoval
Solja Vuoriranta
Riikka Vinkka
Mikko Torvinen
Oskari Ikävalko
Ville Sihvola
Timo Astikainen
